verses.verse: A Psalm of David <WH1732>. Unto thee will I cry <WH7121> <WH8799>, O YY <WH3068> my rock <WH6697>; be not silent <WH2814> <WH8799> to me: lest, if thou be silent <WH2790> <WH8799> to me, I become <WH4911> <WH8738> like them that go down <WH3381> <WH8802> into the pit <WH953>.

Hear <WH8085> <WH8798> the voice <WH6963> of my supplications <WH8469>, when I cry <WH7768> <WH8763> unto thee, when I lift up <WH5375> <WH8800> my hands <WH3027> toward thy holy <WH6944> oracle <WH1687>.

Draw me not away <WH4900> <WH8799> with the wicked <WH7563>, and with the workers <WH6466> <WH8802> of iniquity <WH205>, which speak <WH1696> <WH8802> peace <WH7965> to their neighbours <WH7453>, but mischief <WH7451> is in their hearts <WH3824>.

Give <WH5414> <WH8798> them according to their deeds <WH6467>, and according to the wickedness <WH7455> of their endeavours <WH4611>: give <WH5414> <WH8798> them after the work <WH4639> of their hands <WH3027>; render <WH7725> <WH8685> to them their desert <WH1576>.

Because they regard <WH995> <WH8799> not the works <WH6468> of the YY <WH3068>, nor the operation <WH4639> of his hands <WH3027>, he shall destroy <WH2040> <WH8799> them, and not build them up <WH1129> <WH8799>.
Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> be the YY <WH3068>, because he hath heard <WH8085> <WH8804> the voice <WH6963> of my supplications <WH8469>.

The YY <WH3068> is my strength <WH5797> and my shield <WH4043>; my heart <WH3820> trusted <WH982> <WH8804> in him, and I am helped <WH5826> <WH8738>: therefore my heart <WH3820> greatly rejoiceth <WH5937> <WH8799>; and with my song <WH7892> will I praise <WH3034> <WH8686> him.
The YY <WH3068> is their strength <WH5797>, and he is the saving <WH3444> strength <WH4581> of his anointed <WH4899>.
Save <WH3467> <WH8685> thy people <WH5971>, and bless <WH1288> <WH8761> thine inheritance <WH5159>: feed <WH7462> <WH8798> them also, and lift them up <WH5375> <WH8761> for ever <WH5769>.
